name: Don't Yeet The Baby
description:
Fun time trial racing combined with a twist! That twist is trying to make it to the end while carrying a baby. Can you complete all the courses and unlock the games secrets with out YEETING the baby?!

The game has 6 levels that progressively get more difficult. Try beating each level while going as fast as you can, and share a screenshot of your times!  

The WebGl version should work just fine, but if you have issues, there is a windows build attached as well. 

3D models/Code/ Majority of SFX created by: Seth Funk

All Music and 2 SFX from Pixabay.com

Controls: 

Mouse/Keyboard Layout:

Move: AWSD or Arrow Keys

Camera Control: Mouse

Pause/Unpause : "P" or "Esc" keys

Quick Restart: "R"

Gamepad/Xbox Controller(Recommended For Best Gameplay):

Move: Left Joystick or Dpad (arrows)

Camera Control: Right Joystick

Pause/Unpause : Start button

Quick Restart: Select button
